A Sprite is a simple animated image. A Sprite can have multiple actions.

= C++ Specification:

{{{
SpriteAction:
  std::string name;
  float       speed;
  Vector2f    offset;
  float       scale;

SpriteData:
  SpriteAction[] actions;
}}}

= File Format - *.sprite

{{{
(sprite
  (action
    (name "default")
    (images "streetlamp-highlight.png")
    (offset -111 -215)
  )
)
}}}
